description: Smallest number > 1 equal to sum of n-th powers of its base 4 digits, or 0 if no such number (written in base 10).
links: Joseph Myers, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1887 [From _Joseph Myers_, Jul 07 2009]
crossrefs: Cf. A162219, A162220, A162221. In other bases: A033835 (base 3), A033837 (base 5), A033838 (base 6), A033839 (base 7), A033840 (base 8), A033841 (base 9), A003321 (base 10). [From _Joseph Myers_, Jul 07 2009]
author: _David W. Wilson_
